title: Could the Fox Photographic allegation of killing members of the World Democratic Party prevent "ten times from September "?
subtitle: After Steve Skales was shot on June 14, 2017, a camera from Fox weighed the life of the Republican legislator against health-care-related deaths.
author: Kim LaCapria
vclaim: The Director of Republican Law has calculated deaths against lives likely to be saved by their effects on health-care policy.
